        public static void loadCustomerScene​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        loads the customer scene including loading the customer table and initializing the edit form
        Parameters:
        event - passed from the button that opens the customer scene
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - is thrown if there is an issue with loading
